body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Copy-of-RR-H01-900-×-506-px-3.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-hadiah-buat-yang-tersayang/)__

__10/02/2023__

__Raiz Rewards: Gifts for your loved ones!__

Looking for gifts to send to your loved ones? Check out some amazing promotions and new collections by our brand partners. Moreover? Get cash bonus (or cashback) when you shop using “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” ! Your cashback will get invested into your Raiz account automatically.

Just go to “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “[__Shop Online Here__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” button. We’ll direct you to the brand’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback\*.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

__Lazada__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Lazada.png)

__(+up to 9.1% invested)__

__Special Promotion: A Gift From the Heart__

*   Collect & redeem 10% off vouchers on this Valentine’s Day sale!

__Shopee__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Shopee.png)

__(+up to 6.37% invested)__

__Special Promotion: Valentine’s Day Must Haves__

*   Valentine’s day sale from now until 14th February 2023 on Shopee.
*   __Branded deals from 20% off.__
*   Valentine’s Day gift ideas under RM150.
*   14% coins cashback to help you save more on your hunt to buy the perfect gift.

__Charles & Keith __

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Charles-Keith.png)__

__(+3.43% invested)__

__Special Promotion: Valentine’s Day Collection__

*   Check out Charles & Keith Valentine’s Day collections & make bold fashion choices with latest shoes, bags, and accessories.

__Swarovski__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Swarovski.png)

__(+up to 3.92% invested)__

__Special Promotion: Valentine’s Day Collection__

*   Whether self-love, partnered love, friendship, or a love only you can define, celebrate who you cherish most this Valentine’s Day with Swarovski’s new collection.

__Photobook__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Photobook.png)

__(+up to 10.5% invested)__

__Special Promotion: Valentine’s Day__

*   Use promo code __OURLOVE23__ and get up to 60% off now.

__Printcious __

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Printcious.png)

__(+17.15% invested)__

__Special Promotion: Valentine’s Day Special__

*   Why not have your own Valentine’s Day creation sent to your loved ones? Browse __Printcious__ selection today and impress him or her for the ultimate romantic event of the year.

[![raiz rewards](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Explore-Raiz-Rewards.gif)](https://ye77.adj.st/raiz_rewards?adj_t=lwt55og_doqwx9i&adj_deep_link=raiz-my%3A%2F[%E2%80%A6]iz_rewards&adj_fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Frewards)
